title: Folders and Gmail labels
content: I think I understand the difference between "folders" and Gmail "labels". So, I'm curious. When Thunderbird synchronizes with Gmail, does it create local physical folders for each of the Gmail labels in use, or does it use the Gmail label scheme locally? If a message in Gmail has two different labels attached to it, are there actually two copies of the message created locally in separate folders or not?
creator: wheintzelman

title: unable to receive messages
content: We are unable to receive emails messages sent to our email address, is there a solution.
creator: admin524

title: Spam Bypass Not Working
content:
I just installed the latest Thunderbird 146.0 Win 11.

Configured my server data and Spam settings, etc. Mail coming in and going out OK.

Now I see some messages in the Spam filter that are not Spam. So I click on "Not Spam" button, and the message goes into my Inbox. Great. But after 3-4 seconds, the message is thrown back into the Spam box. I've told it 10 times "Not Spam" and each time it gets moved to the Inbox. Then 3-4 sec later it gets thrown back to the Spam box.

What am I doing wrong? Am I missing a setting?
creator: jl11

title: Dňa 26.9.2025 mi prestala prichádzať pošta.
content:
Dobrý deň, dňa 26.9.2025 mi prestala prichádzať pošta. Odosielanie pošty funguje. Nemenil som žiadne nastavenia, na iných zariadeniach (mobilný telefón Samsung) pošta funguje správne. Kúpil som si nový ntb, nastavil som poštu správne, ale rovnaký problém. Mám tam tri účty @jnpfinance.sk, tie nefungujú a jedn účet @gmail.com a ten funguje správne. Ďakujem za radu

Palo Kučík
creator: jnp.kucik

title: Problem between Bitdefender and Thunderbird
content: Hello, I have the following problem: Bitdefender keeps sending me notifications about Thunderbird emails. I have already contacted their support team and they advised me to tell you that Bitdefender correctly detects and removes infected attachments in the temporary folder; However, some emails do not seem to be deleted or synchronized correctly with Gmail, causing repeated notifications. Can you please help me?

title: Connection to Comcast Email has Stopped Working
content:
Hello All,

After 7 years Thunderbird is no longer working with my comcast email address. I know this is probably a comcast issue but after more then a week trying to get any sort of help from them I have given up on Comcast and turned here hoping this is some simple issue that someone has seen.

Comcast webmail access works fine

Via Thunderbird - I can send a message although it will not make a copy of the sent message and long after the message is actually sent I am looking at a message in TB that says 'Connecting to imap.comcast.net, which eventually times out telling me it cannot make a copy of the message.

I receive no messages at all

Nothing has changed on my end of the configuration

Any insight or ideas would be appreciated.

My basic Server Settings Are imap.comcast.net Port 995 SSL/TLS Normal Password

Thank you.
creator: markbb10
